answers.answer: Well,  preeclampsia is usually a condition of late pregnancy.At 36 weeks,  if you have to deliver early you can expect your baby to be fine.Do you have a doctor's appointment coming up really soon to check your urine for protein?

Ya, this upcoming friday. I have brought up my swelling but it has gotten horrible. My blood pressure has been perfect though. He's about 6 lbs as of now but really want to make it till 38 weeks. I may just be worrying or eating to much salt but really tried to cut back today. Had no soda at all today.

You might want to call your doctor on Monday just to set your mind at ease.  Also,  you can go into a Walgreens or CVS and relax for awhile and take your blood pressure with their machines.Sounds like in any case,  your baby will be fine.  Your baby is far enough along.Best wishes.

question: Has any one come down with preclampsia later in their pregnancy. Depending on what do date you go by I'm 35&4 days or 36&1. My feet and legs are rediculously swollen everyday this week and I haven't wore my wedding ring in two. My blood pressure is usually in then 104 - 110 ish and was 121 this week. Still low but nervous it will continue to go up. Also I've been gaining weight quickly but am afraid it's just water weight. Has any one been fine till the very end of their pregnancy?
title: Preclampsia?
